Articles.Content: Is there a mod that converts the speed reading to miles per hour or kilometers per hour? A silly request i know, but i'm curious

Last I knew, Ferram Aerospace had a window that would let you change the reading on the navball from m/s to many other popular speed readouts. However, if you don't want FAR, it would be fairly easy to put together a mod to do that. I'll make it my next project.

Also:

1 m/s = 2.24 mph = 3.6 kph

There is a older plugin that did that it might still work Speed Unit Changer http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75308-0-24-2-Speed-Unit-Changer-Simple-plugin-to-visualize-speed-in-different-units
